languages.text: {n}Сейчас К'тан... не целостен. Он был разъединен на части, что меньше целого, и сила и мысли Его были разъединены так же. Ощущение пустоты угнетает Его, и Он желает быть воссоединенным.{/n}
{n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сейчас К'тан... не целостен. Он был разъединен на части, что меньше целого, и сила и мысли Его были разъединены так же. Ощущение пустоты угнетает Его, и Он желает быть воссоединенным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Currently, C'Tan is... not whole. He had been split up into pieces, lesser than the whole, and so were his thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness depressed him, and He desires to be made whole again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Currently, C'Tan is... not whole. He had been split up into pieces, lesser than the whole, and so were his thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness depressed him, and He desires to be made whole again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Currently, the C'Tan is... not whole. He was split up into pieces, lesser than the whole, and so were his thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness depressed him, and He yearns to be reassembled again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Currently, the C'Tan is... not whole. He was split up into pieces, lesser than the whole, and so were his thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness depressed him, and He yearns to be reassembled again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

traits.locale_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Actuellement, le C'tan est... incomplet. Il a été divisé en morceaux, diminué, de même que ses pensées et ses pouvoirs. Abattu par ce sentiment oppressant de vide, il aspire à retrouver son intégrité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Actuellement, le C'tan est... incomplet. Il a été divisé en morceaux, diminué, de même que ses pensées et ses pouvoirs. Abattu par ce sentiment oppressant de vide, il aspire à retrouver son intégrité.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}En estos momentos, el C'tan no está... completo. Lo dividieron en fragmentos inferiores, y con eso se limitaron Sus pensamientos y poderes. Esa sensación de vacío Lo oprime, de modo que desea recuperar Su totalidad.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En estos momentos, el C'Tan no está... completo. Le dividieron en fragmentos inferiores, y con eso se limitaron sus pensamientos y poderes. Esa sensación de vacío le abate, de modo que desea recuperar su totalidad.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}目前，星神……并不完整。祂被粉碎成了无数碎片，失去了原本的形态，思想与力量也遭到了限制。这种空虚的感觉令祂难以忍受，祂渴望再度变得完整。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}目前，星神……并不是整体。祂被分割成了无数碎片，失去了原本的形态，思想与力量也遭到了限制。这种空虚的感觉令祂沮丧不已，祂渴望再度变得完整。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}Der C'tan ist im Augenblick ... nicht ganz. Er wurde wie seine Gedanken und Kräfte in kleinere Splitter zerschlagen. Das Gefühl der Leere ist beklemmend und Er seht sich danach, wieder Eins zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der C'tan ist im Augenblick ... nicht vollständig. Er wurde in Teile aufgeteilt, kleiner als das Ganze, und auch seine Gedanken und Kräfte wurden das. Das Gefühl der Leere hat ihn deprimiert, und er sehnt sich danach, wieder zusammengesetzt zu werden.{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}現在、ク＝タンは…完全ではない。それは粉々に砕け散り、それ故に思考と力も同様に分かたれている。空虚に苛まれた彼は、再び合体することを切望しているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}現在、ク＝タンは…完全ではない。彼は完全体よりも小さい断片に分割され、彼の思考と力も同様に分かたれている。空虚に苛まれた彼は、再び合体することを切望しているのだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: ChaosSpawn_Prototype

languages.text: {n}C'tan şu anda tam değil. Düşünceleri ve güçleriyle beraber küçük parçalara ayrıldı. Ezici bir boşluk hissi yaşıyor ve tam olmak için sabırsızlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Currently, the C'tan is... not whole. It was shattered into lesser pieces, and so were Its thoughts and powers. The feeling of emptiness is oppressive, and It yearns to become one again.{/n}
